params.sqlcmd: "select " +" M_ORG.\\"ORG_CD\\" as \\"ORG_CD\\", " +" M_ORG.\\"ORG_NAME\\" as \\"ORG_NAME\\", " +" M_ORG.\\"ORG_ANAME\\" as \\"ORG_ANAME\\", " +" M_ORG.\\"ORG_KNAME\\" as \\"ORG_KNAME\\", " +" M_ORG.\\"ORG_ENAME\\" as \\"ORG_ENAME\\", " +" M_ORG.\\"ZIP_CD\\" as \\"ZIP_CD\\", " +" M_ORG.\\"ADDRESS_1\\" as \\"ADDRESS_1\\", " +" M_ORG.\\"ADDRESS_2\\" as \\"ADDRESS_2\\", " +" M_ORG.\\"ADDRESS_K_1\\" as \\"ADDRESS_K_1\\", " +" M_ORG.\\"ADDRESS_K_2\\" as \\"ADDRESS_K_2\\", " +" M_ORG.\\"TEL\\" as \\"TEL\\", " +" M_ORG.\\"FAX\\" as \\"FAX\\", " +" M_ORG.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" M_ORG " +"where " +" M_ORG.\\"ORG_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_ORG.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ?"
